Reviews.Title: RCA 720P 32# TV LED32B30RO
Reviews.Author: iflysan
Reviews.Content: I bought this 32" tv to solve a space problem as it has a very small width 29.4".  The 720P picture is good and audio is adequate.  Only issue I saw was that the 2 of the 3 HDMI connectors come out the side (rather than the bottom) and if horizontal space is tight this could be a concern.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for but sometimes a bit more
Reviews.Author: lloyd
Reviews.Content: Great little tv for the money.  Paid $227 at Kmart for this bedroom tv.  It has a great picture and as light as a can of coffee!  RCA may not be the most "recognized" brand, but the pic looked as good if not better than the the compitition.  And they are $40-$50 more!  Seems like a great value!

Reviews.Title: Man Cave Approved
Reviews.Author: drp103
Reviews.Content: I had some credit card points to burn, so I got a gift card and used it to buy a NEXUS 7 2nd GEN tablet and this HDTV - not from here but from K-Mart online.I have this little gem set up out in my man cave. For now, all I have hooked up to it is an DTV ANTENNA, pulling in local HDTV channels like CBS, etc. Now, I can watch a little NFL on Sundays with the sound off while listening to some tunes on the HIFI.It's a really basic HDTV with the bare minimum of picture adjustments, and has only 720P resolution. But, don't let these two things stop you from buying it; the picture looks great (after a few adjustments), and besides, you really don't need any more resolution for such a small size screen. The HD channels look fantastic; CBS broadcasts at 1080i and the football games look great - I didn't notice any blurring or pixel blocking during the fast action scenes. I'm a happy camper.Connectivity, too, is pretty basic. There are a couple HDMI inputs, older component and composite, and I believe a pair of stereo RCA audio inputs. There's a headphone jack that doubles as an analog audio output, so you can run audio to an analog amp or, of course, plug a pair of headphones into it. And finally, there is one digital coax output, so you can run audio to a digital amp. It does not have optical output.As a bonus, there is a USB media input. I honestly have not tried it yet, so I don't know what it is capable of playing - audio, video, pictures or otherwise. UPDATE: I plugged in a thumb drive with four different files on it: a JPEG Picture, M4A and MP3 Audio tracks, a short smartphone video, and an MKV file of a Twilight Zone episode. It played the MP3 audio song and showed the JPEG picture. There is no support for M4A audio (APPLE LOSSLESS) or MKV movies/TV shows. In fact I don't think this TV can even play any videos of any kind, even the ones that you can capture on your smartphone. So basically, it only plays MP3 audio tracks and you can view JPEG pics, that's it, and that's not too bad, considering the price. The interface and the player are really basic, but both worked just fine.The TV stand is a bit chintzy: a glass base and two other plastic parts. The whole thing is poorly designed and built. It took about 10 minutes to screw the parts together and to the TV itself, but thankfully, it's pretty solid, though I had my doubts. Of course, you can ditch it for a wall mount, as the TV has four threaded holes on the back for just that purpose.11/19/2013 - There're no networking options for this TV, either WIFI or ETHERNET. In other words, it's not a smart TV sporting things like NETFLIX streaming or support for DLNA. For the price, I wouldn't expect it. But, guess what? You could turn this dummy into a brain by buying a 35 dollar CHROMECAST. Afterall, it does have USB, which the CHROMECAST needs for power. In this regard, college students I'm looking at you, this is the perfect TV for young tech savvy people who are looking for a cheap HDTV and own ANDROID phones. Or, it could also double as a second computer monitor.All in all, It's a great looking HDTV at a wonderful price. Highly Recommended!

Reviews.Title: Excellent small TV
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: I already had an identical TV in a bedroom.  This one replaced an old set in the kitchen.  In both cases I'm using auxiliary speakers (computer speakers can be connected to the phone jack). Small ultra-thin LED TVs have mini-speakers (often down-facing) which can't be expected to do much. These sets have a nice surround audio option, but aux speakers are necessary to appreciate it.  Another good feature is the 3 HDMI inputs.  Picture quality is excellent, even with SD sources.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic!
Reviews.Author: Ian Meseck
Reviews.Content: The television itself is fantastic, as was the seller who was very prompt and even contacted me to let me know when it was going to be sent. The remote is a bit crappy, but I've got another one lying around, plus the Wii U we got for Christmas functions as a television remote as well! All in all, it's working out wonderfully and functions rather well!Do be warned, the television takes a moment to start up, so don't spam the power button or you'll confuse it. Press it once, and give it a few seconds to "warm up".

Reviews.Title: Great Tv...not so great sound.
Reviews.Author: Sara
Reviews.Content: It has great picture.  BUT the sound is awful.  I just got some little computer speakers and plugged them into the headphone area, and voila! The sound is perfect.  Other than the sound everything is great!  I would suggest if you do buy this tv to buy some litte speakers, or a sound system to plug it into.

Reviews.Title: Love It !!!!
Reviews.Author: Deonta Badger
Reviews.Content: I am in the Army and I stay in the Barracks. My girlfriend purchased the TV for me as a surprise and I love it. Perfect TV for a little room.

Reviews.Title: Nice television for the money!
Reviews.Author: Frances
Reviews.Content: For the price, this TV is everything I needed.  I bought this for my guest bedroom.  It was easy to set up. The picture is crisp and clear. The sound quality isn't great, but if you adjust it using the menu it's not bad.

Reviews.Title: Just OK but a reasonable value for the money
Reviews.Author: Q-New
Reviews.Content: Fairly good picture on this TV; I grew up with RCA so felt pretty comfortable buying it.  I don't understand why it takes a full 8 seconds after you turn on the thing for sound and picture to show up; that's just annoying.  I also dislike that there are zero buttons on the device itself so if you lose the remote, you're screwed.  Also, on some channels / programs, the picture is muddy and fuzzy. Fiddling with the <aspect> button allows me to change the size of the picture onscreen, but it's pretty much almost totally ineffective in terms of sharpening the picture.Nevertheless, for the price paid, I think this is a reasonable purchase.  Not much to write home about but I wouldn't be tempted to return it.

Reviews.Title: Junk
Reviews.Author: Suffered Enough
Reviews.Content: I purchased this set in January 2013 and the warranty period expired by 90 days and the TV totally failed to turn on.  Don't waste your money.  I placed several calls to RCA and got the run around, placed on long waits and finally got their voice mail to leave a message.  No customer service.  It will go into the trash bin and I'll purchase a quality product such as a Samsung. This clearly was a waste of money.

Reviews.Title: ok
Reviews.Author: Al Capone
Reviews.Content: alright tv, have had some problems with the screen flashing black for a split second, have not tried to resolve it yet

Reviews.Title: Do not buy!!!! Waste of Money!!! READ HERE
Reviews.Author: RainCityCoug
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV last month as a bedroom TV. I saw the great price and decent reviews online and decided to take a risk and purchase a TV that had mixed reviews... Boy do I regret it.It wasn't a few days before this TV had dead pixels forming before my eyes as I proceeded to tell myself it was a quality TV for the price. Next, the HDMI port proceeded to fail and cause the screen to be fuzzy, having to play around with the cord to get the picture back again. THIS TV IS LOW QUALITY. Sure, I expected sub-perfect quality, but I didn't expect a TV that is just absolutely un-watchable.Returning the TV was a nightmare and I don't wish it upon my worst enemy! I wish I would have just purchased a quality TV to begin with.After dealing with the return, I purchased a MUCH better TV for nearly the same price, actually $10 cheaper!.If you want a QUALITY 32 inch TV, check this one out -----> http://amzn.to/1gYLcMs, it is here on Amazon. I currently own it now and have never been HAPPIER! It has a great quality picture and wasn't insanely expensive like some of the other TV's for sale here. Please, save yourself the time and frustration that I put myself through!

Reviews.Title: defect
Reviews.Author: SIETSKE H HEFLIN
Reviews.Content: I ordered this same tv 3 times and all of them were defective, so I decided to go with a different brand.

Reviews.Title: Like the stream line of this TV.
Reviews.Author: Diane Romania
Reviews.Content: I have a one room apartment in a senior housing complex and this TV is the perfect fit for me.Diane

Reviews.Title: Possibly deferctive
Reviews.Author: DCLXVI
Reviews.Content: I bought this item to use as a computer monitor but recently decided to try it as a tv.  When connected to my entertainment system it causes a herringbone pattern on the other tvs in the house.  Only disconnecting this tv will make the interference stop.  The connectors feel like they are poorly made or that the construction is sub standard.  It works well as a computer monitor though but as a tv it is junk!  There is nothing wrong with my equipment as the interference only happens with this one connected.

Reviews.Title: It was a great buy
Reviews.Author: Armida
Reviews.Content: It is a great buy - I am enjoying using it very much.what else can I say -  I give it  a 10

Reviews.Title: Really NICE I LIKE
Reviews.Author: DARLENE JACKSON
Reviews.Content: I LOVE This TV I WOULD LIKE TO GET A 42-Inch I NEED ONE FOR THE LIVERROOM GET ONE YOU'LL LIKE It TO

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: CARLOS LUIS GAMEZ DELGADO
Reviews.Content: VERY GOOD!!!AMAZING PICTURE!A very low cost!!!  over other brands,the tv is packaged in perfect conditionrelation incredible price - quality

Reviews.Title: GREAT TV FOR THE PRICE
Reviews.Author: Rob
Reviews.Content: GREAT TV FOR THE PRICE. NICE FOR EXTRA BEDROOM OR KIDS PLAYROOM. SOUND IS NOT LIKE SURROUND SOUND BUT GOOD. EASY SET UP.

Reviews.Title: Great utility TV
Reviews.Author: Michael Mohseni
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV for a work/break area.  Has all the functions you need for such a location.  Good picture quality but not superb.  Sound is good as well but again not superb.  For the cost, it was worth the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Jerry B. Fussell
Reviews.Content: We use this TV in our kitchen area for TV and streaming videos.  It performs perfectly, picture is great and the price is reasonable.  Buy with confidence.

Reviews.Title: Meh
Reviews.Author: Lea-Anne Cornett
Reviews.Content: Needed a TV for guests coming over and I wish I had of waited to buy a TV on Black Friday instead.  This TV is ok.  The picture quality is fine but I'm disappointed in the quality of the hookups and also it has some weird aspect ratios.

Reviews.Title: A mal functioning Christmas gift
Reviews.Author: Elaine Severino
Reviews.Content: I was very disappointed as it was a Christmas gift & it did not work [the screen would not project a picture]Several people worked to get this TV working including my cable carrier only to be told "This screen is fried"

Reviews.Title: Great buy!
Reviews.Author: dee herbert
Reviews.Content: I needed to TV in my dining room and didn't wang to big or too small.  The price was right.  This fit perfectly.  The only con...the volume sucks so I hooked it up to my entrainment center.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture Quality
Reviews.Author: David Gordon
Reviews.Content: Great Picture and good price, under $200 for a 32 inch. No VGA. Has two HDMI inputs and also a USB

Reviews.Title: good buy!
Reviews.Author: Sharon Browne
Reviews.Content: It does not swivel but it has an excellent picture quality. It is a good buy for a great price.

Reviews.Title: RCA TV
Reviews.Author: Ms. Rosalie Sisneros "nanna24"
Reviews.Content: TV arrived ahead of schedule and was very easy to set up with DirecTV.  It's just great.  We enjoy watching on it and I only wish I had ordered two.  I don't know if this item is still available.  If it is, I plan to order for Christmas.

Reviews.Title: Good starter television
Reviews.Author: Benjamin E. Lee
Reviews.Content: Bought this television for my daughter who just moved into her own apartment.  It's a nice television with a good quality picture for the price.  It's not top of the line, but I don't expect it to be.  I think it's a good starter television.

Reviews.Title: Good value for a midsize TV.
Reviews.Author: ATurner
Reviews.Content: TV is crisp and clear; others complained of stuck pixels, but we have had no problems in the month we have had this TV. The only complaint I would have, and have to be picky to come up with it, is that the lag between pushing the power button and the screen activating is about 3 seconds. Would recommend this to those looking for a cheap midsize TV.

Reviews.Title: An excellent purchase experience
Reviews.Author: Anonymous
Reviews.Content: Awesome television for the price! Beautiful picture, decent sound, has everything I wanted in a television. We live in Hawaii, and opted for the free shipping and it got here in four days!

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Robert Feddersen
Reviews.Content: Nice TV. Excellent picture and sound. Lost of features for the price.  Looks nice too.Would be nice if the stand swiveled.

Reviews.Title: Great Purchase
Reviews.Author: Anne Waters "Anne Waters"
Reviews.Content: Purchased this TV for my Mom and she loves it, great picture and sound! Mom Love's it, This TV is great bang for your buck

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price.
Reviews.Author: D. Johnson
Reviews.Content: This is a nice TV. I get tired of people giving bad reviews on cheap TVs. I paid just under $200 for this TV and bang for the buck is good. It is not the nicest 32" TV I have seen but it also is not over $1000. It only has 2 HDMI ports. The sound could be better but once again it is what it is and it is good for the small room I have it in. Needless to say I am happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the Money
Reviews.Author: AnneCarol
Reviews.Content: Just bought this RCA TV for my game room. I was very impressed by the quality. This is a great looking TV. The sound and picture are fantastic. It was shipped in about 5 days for FREE.Absolutely love this TV. RCA is a good brand that has been around for 60 or 70 years or more.

Reviews.Title: great price, not so great sound
Reviews.Author: hollatainment
Reviews.Content: The sound leaves much to be desired, a tad noisy but nothing a good surround system cannot take care of.I love it!!

Reviews.Title: Dont Make TV's like They USE To
Reviews.Author: terri
Reviews.Content: For the price I am not complaining.  $199 for a name brand that has been around since the 1920's.  However this TV has been gutted with minimum external components.  It only has 2 HDMI connections and 1 of those is dual purpose HDMI/DVI.  Only 1 either used as Component or AVI connection.  A digital audio output (something I haven't yet investigated how is used) and 1 headphone jack & 1 USB port.  That is it.  Several years ago I bought 2 26" RCA's and it came loaded with 4 HDMI, VGA, 1 component, 1 AVI, USB, 1 audio in, and 2 audio outputs.VGA isn't required for those who did not know that.  On my 26" I had been using a HDMI port for my computer.  In fact I used the VGA & HDMI ports and had instant dual monitors.  I did want one of these 32"'s for my home office/sitting area but instead I bought a $59 RCA sound bar and plug it into one of the audio outputs on the 26".  I'm thinking a special headphone adapter that splits into a A/V connector might also work to use a sound bar with but I haven't tried that.On the plus side this 32" specs indicate it comes with 2 8Watt speakers.  Where most t.v.s now come with 2 4Watt speakers. I have twin 3 1/2 year old sons and noise is a constant at my home so a sound bar fixed that on my 26".Instead, now, I'm keeping the 2 - 26" t.v.'s for my home office since that is where I need all of the different connections and I bought 3 of these 32" RCA's for the rest of the house. The outside antenna's picks up over 60 stations on this 32" t.v. that was my only concern.  However I wasn't really concerned because I already had RCA's and knew they did a great job picking up air stations.Hope this is helpful.

Reviews.Title: Finally upgraded!
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: Finally got past my old tube TV. And i'm very happy about it. Great TV and size for the price.

Reviews.Title: missing some plugs on the back
Reviews.Author: stevan boozer
Reviews.Content: TV works great  but not as pictured the inputs and output are missing side from that it works well for the price paid. quick shipping.

Reviews.Title: Great little TV
Reviews.Author: Nick
Reviews.Content: Bought this for an overseas TV.  Works great, clear picture and doesn everything we need it to for a very reasonable price.  The only downside I've discovered so far is that the USB doesn't recognize alot of USB media, no biggie though.

Reviews.Title: Happy with purchase
Reviews.Author: J. Noffsinger "Jack"
Reviews.Content: Great little tv for my kitchen.  Sound is not quite what I would like, but overall I am happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Poor Construction
Reviews.Author: Ronald Maniglia
Reviews.Content: Although the picture and sound were of acceptable quality for the price, the workmanship was poor. Within weeks after purchase the prongs on the power cable snapped off when the cord was removed from an electrical outlet.

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: David Kehoss "Dave"
Reviews.Content: Easy set up and great picture, and good sound.  I would highly recommend it. fine fine fine fine fine fine

Reviews.Title: Good small TV
Reviews.Author: Beverly W. Seybert
Reviews.Content: I got this TV for my bedroom.  It works fine there.  The sound is a little tinny, but you can get use to that.I would recommend this to friends and family

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Nikki Williams
Reviews.Content: Product arrive quickly, Works awesome no issue.  To assemble was no problems at all. Recommend it who is looking for a 32 inch tv

Reviews.Title: Bought Two for My Office Workstation
Reviews.Author: Brad Butler "Brad Bulter"
Reviews.Content: AFter my wife got me one for our home office, mainly for TV, I hooked it up to laptop and decided to get two for my office; reasonably priced, bright LED screen, good resolution with VGA connection, 1360 by 768, one computer couldn't recognize VGA connect, so switched to other, all ok.  Probably my video card or something, but happy with the way they operate and much better on the eyss.Video editing, photo editing, word processing, web browsing all made better.Brad

Reviews.Title: Sweet Little TV
Reviews.Author: Chuck
Reviews.Content: This is a great small TV for the price!  I bought it for the kitchen to replace an old 13" analog model.  Amazing how much room this saves compared to the old one.  The only drawback is the sound, as others have noted.  It's tinny.  However, in a small area with the bass set on highest and the treble the lowest, it is just fine.  I paid only $118 on Amazon and received it promptly, as always with Amazon.  A great value I think.

Reviews.Title: Good TV for the Price
Reviews.Author: Paul
Reviews.Content: I purchased two of these TV's in September of 2012. I have used them for a little over two months. I have a Roku box and Standard Cable connected to each.Pro's: Good picture for the size. Adequate connections.Con's: Poor sound but good enough to be heard across my bedroom when raised past mid selection level. Not really a show stopper for me.

Reviews.Title: VGA Non Existent
Reviews.Author: Raoul Edwardo Robles
Reviews.Content: I purposely purchased this item because of the VGA port shown on the description.  Just received the TV and there isn't a VGA or DVI port.  This was to be a monitor now it's going to be just a waist of time and effort.  I haven't tested the quality at all.

Reviews.Title: Horrible Sound
Reviews.Author: A. Hagen
Reviews.Content: I've had this TV about 6 months. Pleased with the picture, but the sound is horrible. I wouldn't buy this again, just because of the terrible speaker.  It might be okay if you use it in a room with NO other background noise (not even a ticking clock), have excellent hearing, and keep the volume set at less than about one-fifth of what it will go to. Once beyond that, the sound is totally distorted.  It's a shame, because like I said, the picture is good.

Reviews.Title: Buy Quality!
Reviews.Author: The Bookworm
Reviews.Content: This is a quality television set.  The picture is great, the colors are vibrant.  I know others complained about the sound, but I personally think that the sound is fine and very strong.  It's a perfect small t.v. for any room in your home.

Reviews.Title: perfect for the kitchen
Reviews.Author: Deborah Jacobson "eclectic packrat"
Reviews.Content: I really like this product. I bought it to replace my old one in thekitchen. What a difference in sound and picture from what I had.It also is making my cable company's transition to alll digital simplerfor me as now I do not need their adapter. I find myself going tothe kitchen to watch more frequently than I ever did in the past.This is a great product and I would highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: find another TV !!!!
Reviews.Author: s. kelly
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my mother and I feel guilty for it. My parents don't understand the difference between high definition and standard definition. An average tv with standard definition looks better than this TV with high definition!! I'm very disappointed.The TV has drab lifeless colors and is very grainy with every sort of signal. Blacks have absolutely no detail.zero. if you watch a movie there's a dark scene you won't be seeing much. Your better off closing your eyes and listening.Just as I am writing this review my father asks is the color adjusted right? My response is yes but this TV is just that bad!!! I've tried every sort of adjustment to no avail.Just find another $100 or so and buy a better TV. There will be no satisfaction from buying this TV. Its better to find the extra cash and be safe than to buy cheap hoping it'll be good enough. Trust me this TV is nowhere near good enough.

Reviews.Title: I need help
Reviews.Author: LLoyd James
Reviews.Content: The television has been in and out of the repair shop ,,,,,,,,,, it keep loosing its audio,  have  to keep changing sound A/C and i am tired , i just change it and two days after same thing again,,,,, NO SOUND .. i am frustrated and i don't know what else too do with it .... it haven't lasted no time ( problems in the first year of having it)

Reviews.Title: Not a good buy
Reviews.Author: Marsha G.
Reviews.Content: This TV has terrible sound projection. I tried several sound bars but couldn't get them to work with the TV. The volume doesn't stay consistent when watching DVD's. I would not recommend this television-I ordered a Sony @ the same time & am much happier with it.

Reviews.Title: I like this tv for the price...
Reviews.Author: Cody
Reviews.Content: I like this tv except that it didnt come with the pc input like was showed in the picture but i just ended up using the old tv i replace and used that for my monitor for watching movies... The tv has great picture and sound is ok.. if you dont like sound there is a headphone jack where you can hook up a surround sound to it for better sound.. Also great picture for playing video games

Reviews.Title: Great buy for the Money!
Reviews.Author: Linda Bressler
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV for the kitchen. I mounted it on the wall with the wall mount I also purchased at Amazon. It was easy to set up and the picture is really good. It is perfect for what I wanted. The sound is ok. It is not like I watch movies on this tv. I use it in the morning to get the news. It is a good tv for the money!

Reviews.Title: wonderful little tv
Reviews.Author: rosegardener
Reviews.Content: after reading many, many reviews on many, many different brands, and taking into consideration the fact that since this tv was going into a barely used guest room so i wanted to keep the price way down, i took the plunge and ordered it.i was first amazed at how quickly the set up was.  screwed the stand to the screen, put the cable connection on, followed a brief few instructions on the tv itself and bam, simple as that i had an outstanding picture and A+ sound to boot.we have dish in the house but the guesthouse isn't wired for dish.  there is an antenna in the attic with a cable connector so i wasn't expecting too much but this little gem picked up about 40 stations.i was so happy with this purchase that i just ordered two more to replace my ancient tv in the bedroom and my newer, but crappy, tv in the kitchen.  i paid less for these two new ones than the one i currently have in the kitchen and it has never had a decent picture.thanks to amazon and i have to thank RCA too.  i didn't think these older brands could compete with the newer, highly touted brands but i was wrong.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV, works well
Reviews.Author: RKG
Reviews.Content: This TV is a nice small tv for a bedroom or kitchen.  We use it in the kitchen and the picture and color are very good.  The sound quality is a bit poor but just add a cheap pair of external speakers and you are ready to go.  Since we only watch this tv while eating or working in the kitchen, it is a good deal for us.  Would not recommend for your main tv viewing.UPDATE --  We plugged speakers in the aux on the side but then they stopped working, then tried the back, that lasted about a day.  Now no external speakers work.  Sound quality is very bad on this tv but since we only use it in the kitchen, it is okay.

Reviews.Title: False advertising - No VGA
Reviews.Author: Rob S.
Reviews.Content: Bought product specifically because of the VGA port shown in the pictures.  The TV arrived with no VGA port and 1 less HDMI port than shown,

Reviews.Title: STUCK PIXEL
Reviews.Author: S. Rau
Reviews.Content: I bought a refurbished model, but obviously, no QC is done following "refurbishment" (which I think means just re-packing it without turning it on to see if anything is wrong with the product). The TV itself is very nice to look at when it was turned off. And has a very heavy glass/metal stand. But who cares what a TV looks like when it's off? When I turned it on, the display was very crisp, but I immediately noticed a royal blue, stuck pixel in the left center of the screen, about an inch long. Then, I really started to examine the screen, by tuning to a channel that was mostly black, and I noticed another stuck pixel (also blue) about a half-inch long in the right-center of the screen about halfway up. I turned the TV off and back on. Still there.For a split second, I considered not sending it back (because you know what a hassle that can be), so I stood back from the TV about 10 feet away and still noticed both of them every time the screen was dark in those areas. I decided it would eventually drive me mad, so I'm in the process of returning it. I bought a COBY 32 inch (brand new this time), so we'll see how that compares. I bet if you bought this thing new and it actually worked, it would be well worth it. That's why I'm giving it 2 stars instead of 1.

Reviews.Title: Gift
Reviews.Author: Virginia Drake
Reviews.Content: A Christmas present for my mother-in-law to replace her ancient TV which didn't bring in all the available stations.  She was surprised at the great picture and loves the larger screen.

Reviews.Title: It's nice
Reviews.Author: Professional shopper
Reviews.Content: I received this TV as a Christmas gift, so I have not even had it for 1 week. I was surprised by the quality of the picture, which is very good. As long as it's on "component" the picture is crystal clear. I removed 1 star because of the sound. The sound is really bad (tinny sounding), but I hooked up some old computer speakers and it has helped a little, but eventually I will have to get a soundbar. This television is perfect for a bedroom if that's what you're considering.

Reviews.Title: Great buy........
Reviews.Author: Gail Buzin
Reviews.Content: excellent for the price! Highly recommended........vivid picture, sound only fair.......have the DVD edition that is also excellent for the price.

Reviews.Title: sound is not that high and it comes from the back of the tv so not that good but picture is great
Reviews.Author: augie
Reviews.Content: sounds not that goodsound is not that high and it comes from the back of the tv so not that good but picture is great

Reviews.Title: Have to agree with most negative reviews
Reviews.Author: Wes
Reviews.Content: It says 3 HDMI connections.  There are only two.  Not a deal breaker for me but I'm sure it would annoy some.  Sound is fair at best.  Don't expect good sound from this unit.  To make matters worse, a lot of shows you need to turn up the volume close to max to hear it.  The power cord is VERY short fyi.  Not a big deal if you have a surge protector but it's a 3 prong ext. So it's not a good idea using a extension cord.  I'm most likely returning the unit depending on how the new larger one is.It's just one of those t.v. some will like and some won't.  It's good for a Kitchen, a small bedroom.  I'm thinking 4-5 years from now instead of saving a few bucks.  Better off going larger if you use it often and it's for a larger bedroom.

Reviews.Title: GREAT TV
Reviews.Author: TARA
Reviews.Content: I PURCHASED THIS TV FOR A STARTER FOR MY LIVING ROOMIT WAS TOO SMALL SO I MOVED IT TO MY BEDROOM, THE PICTURE QUALITY IS GREAT AND THE SOND IS GREATID BUY AGAIN IN LARGER SIZE OF COURSEOTHER WISE I LOVE IT

Reviews.Title: RCA LED TV
Reviews.Author: Maria
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tv on  Thursday morning and it arrived on Saturday.  This tv has an easy control options.  Picture is clear, sound  is great. I love the fact that it fits perfectly in my tv  cabinet.  Huge difference in size compared to a 22 inch tv..  I bought it as a bedroom tv. to replace my old 19 box tv .  this tv has a remote.

Reviews.Title: Nice picture
Reviews.Author: Christy M. Barry
Reviews.Content: This is a super slim, very light TV. The picture is great. Perfect for a bedroom or to hang on the wall. Weighs almost nothing and has two HDMI attachments.

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: old-grandad "old-grandad"
Reviews.Content: So far, I am very pleased with this unit, easy to install, bright picture, good color, sound OK, good buy

Reviews.Title: nice little TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Ricardo
Reviews.Content: easy to set-up, good picture and 3 HDMI inputs. I added a good set of speakers to improve the sound.

Reviews.Title: great tv for the price, clear bright picture
Reviews.Author: cfw1970
Reviews.Content: great tv, it only has 2 hdmi ports. That is OK cause I WAS able to use the composite for the sat box. Great sound considering the size of the unit. Nice heavy base for support. Perfect for the bedroom or any small room.

Reviews.Title: Great TV Great price
Reviews.Author: Use2dj
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a nice little TV for my kitchen and this fit the bill. Very good HD for its size and it fits most kitchen decor. the picture its bright with color and is supplied with plenty inputs for cable and DVD.

Reviews.Title: Nice little set for the $$
Reviews.Author: Laura Beatty-Walsh
Reviews.Content: I use it in my bedroom. I got used to the seemingly small screen size quickly. Great picture. OK sound.

Reviews.Title: My RCA 19-inch HDTV
Reviews.Author: Lola Staples
Reviews.Content: The RCA TV is fine, except for the sound.  That is terrible!  It sounds like people are talking in a tunnel!

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for.
Reviews.Author: Juleigha
Reviews.Content: It works, but it sounds funny. My old heavy boxy 19 inch sounds much better than this. It sounds 'tiney' It is 19 inches diag. but seems so much smaller. It's for a spare room so I'm ok with it. I would look for something else and pay a bit more if this were going to be in something other than a spare room.

Reviews.Title: Great little TV for the price!
Reviews.Author: Reba S Gizdic
Reviews.Content: This is a great little TV for the bedroom or kitchen!  All the extras of a big TV packaged in a little one.

Reviews.Title: Good little TV
Reviews.Author: jewelz
Reviews.Content: It works great- easy to use.  Both the sound and picture are good.  It is very lightweight, which might matter depending on the location planned for the TV.  The remote is way too big, in my opinion.  The remote size is a minor annoyance.  Overall, nice little TV.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Ariel nichols
Reviews.Content: At first I was confused to as what size 19" is. But when I got the TV in the mail today. I quickly plugged it in and turned it on and played one of my sons movies. The quality is amazing. The sound is perfect. It is easy to set up as well. I will be recommending this TV to everyone i know whose looking for a small TV

Reviews.Title: Decent TV for price but not that great.
Reviews.Author: Student
Reviews.Content: I've had this TV for almost 2 months now and its ok but I wouldn't buy another one. The sound sometimes randomly goes out (I have to turn it off then back on for it to work again). The sound isn't that great but its passable. The picture is ok but mine has a dead pixel that is pretty annoying.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Gregg W
Reviews.Content: I want to see no complaints about this TV. I even purchased an under the counter bracket and all works great.

Reviews.Title: My New Buddy
Reviews.Author: Olga
Reviews.Content: Great TV for the price. Great purchase! BUY THIS TV! YOU WILL NOT REGRET IT, YA'LL! GREAT COLORS, SLEEK DESIGN!

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: MerryKay
Reviews.Content: I gave this as a gift.  Recipient is totally happy -- and, believe me, I hear complaints if it wasn't good enough.

Reviews.Title: good tv for cheap
Reviews.Author: Techy Owl "Blaine Miller"
Reviews.Content: i was looking for a nice hd tv for the cheap. i needed a secondary tv so 720p was perfect for watching hd cartoons on cartoon network and if i wanted to i could switch to my projector. the functionality is nice has a lot of option. one thing to note there is absolutely no buttons on the tv itself which is great for public display i suppose.i don't use the sound i have my cable box hooked up via optical audio. but there is a way to do that with this tv specifically but not without additional converters. the inputs were surprising for this small of a tv the color is vary vibrant almost too much so.

Reviews.Title: Not the quality I expected.
Reviews.Author: Satisified buyer.
Reviews.Content: Picture quality not as good as other similar priced brands I have viewed.Adjustment method of color & picture particulars leaves a lot to be desired,not very user friendly - clarity of fine pic details just not there.

Reviews.Title: Stuck pixels
Reviews.Author: K
Reviews.Content: When this tv arrived, as soon as I plugged it in I saw a bright yellow stuck pixel in the middle of the screen. It would be pretty hard to ignore while trying to watch anything. I tried several things to unstick the pixel, but nothing helped. I sent it back for a replacement, but when the replacement arrived, it also had a bright yellow stuck pixel. Am returning the second one for a refund. Would not recommend.

Reviews.Title: Great picture quality
Reviews.Author: K. Beckman
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my master bath so I could watch the Today show in the morning when I was getting ready for work. Perfect size for a bath, mounted on the wall, and the picture quality and sound are better than I imagined, for the price.

Reviews.Title: Good TV for the price
Reviews.Author: zvallejo
Reviews.Content: The TV is a decent size for use in a bedroom or as a kitchen TV.  The picture quality is ok but you might have to adjust the options to your liking.  The HDMI option is also a plus.

Reviews.Title: Perfect TV for a small bedroom or kitchen.
Reviews.Author: Patricia Costello
Reviews.Content: Take it out of the box hook up to cable or if you are like me use it as a tv for over the air reception and it is wonderful.

Reviews.Title: We love it in our bathroom ! Nice picture !!!
Reviews.Author: Loveamazon
Reviews.Content: I have owned the RCA 32" for 2.5 years. I love this TV in my master bathroom. It has a good picture for the size, the color is spot on, the TV is small so the built in speakers are not that powerful which makes the sound quality low. I have mine wall mounted but, it does come with a stand that swivels so that's a plus. This TV works for what we intended to use it for.

Reviews.Title: It was new and it arrived fast. Very happy with the purchase in all respects. Excellent price as well as very good packing for a
Reviews.Author: D. Sowell
Reviews.Content: It was new and it arrived fast. Very happy with the purchase in all respects. Excellent price as well as very good packing for a change.

Reviews.Title: RCA 19in tv
Reviews.Author: tn girl
Reviews.Content: This tv was a mother's day gift for my mom to replace a tv in her kitchen.  She loves it.  Very good picture and sound.Very happy with this purchase, price was good and received it the day after my order was placed

Reviews.Title: speaker clarity leaves allot to be desired
Reviews.Author: Dan Lenihan
Reviews.Content: Unit lacks controls on the top so don't misplace the remote. Wife dislikes the tone of the speakers. Would be good for a child's room but not in the kitchen where I have it.I had a similar unit from 2010 that stopped working. It was a good set but cost to check it out negated its repair. That unit had top controls

Reviews.Title: Sound concerns
Reviews.Author: criss hughes
Reviews.Content: I love the size of this TV but as others have said, this unit came with sound distortions and I returned it.

Reviews.Title: Sound quality
Reviews.Author: Linda H.
Reviews.Content: Absolutely horrible sound quality.  Had to add external speakers to increase volume and some what improve quality.  Picture is okay.

Reviews.Title: Terrible sound
Reviews.Author: leonard foster
Reviews.Content: The sound on this tv is terrible, sounds like a transistor radio im sorry i bought this tv. Its Terrible!!!.

Reviews.Title: Nice reasonable bedroom TV
Reviews.Author: Old Guy in Florida
Reviews.Content: Picture is good. Purchased it for my bedroom. Perfect size. Only issue is poor sound quality. Sounds like a cheap radio. Guess I could purchase exterior speakers but it seems they should have included decent speakers.

Reviews.Title: Muy buen producto - Muy Recomendado
Reviews.Author: GUSTAVO MORALES
Reviews.Content: Cuando me llego este televisor me gusto mucho; tiene el tamaño ideal para el proposito para el cual lo adquiri; tiene muy buena imagen y cumple con todas las caracteristicas que especifique en la compra.

Reviews.Title: very disappointed
Reviews.Author: sbrein
Reviews.Content: Extremely weak digital tuner. Does not pick up any signals even with an amplified antenna. Green pixel on screen. Not recommended for over-the-air/antenna use if you are struggling with weak signal issues. Might work with cable/satellite if you don't mind the green pixel.

Reviews.Title: Misleading Pictures
Reviews.Author: Conrad
Reviews.Content: I'm sure the TV is great, but I was surprised to see the product pictures and read the many reviews that indicated 3 HDMI ports, when the unit I received only had 1 HDMI port. I'm guessing the 32" model has 3 HDMI ports while the 19" only has 1, but the pictures were for the model that I received, and they clearly indicated 3 HDMI ports. Very disappointed that the item description and pictures were not clearer regarding the number of ports, but thankful for Amazon's great customer service in handling the return.

Reviews.Title: not good
Reviews.Author: Courtney Blake
Reviews.Content: I bought this alleged 19" tv to replace my 13" because I was having trouble reading the subtitles on foreign movies. The picture is NOT as shown in the Amazon listing, filling the entire screen. There are options for the picture size. The Normal setting gives a picture with a large black outline around it, so large that the image is no bigger than it was on my 13" tv. There is a Cinema setting, which fills the screen, but that cuts off so much of the image that the subtitles are lost. So this product fails to deliver the very feature for which I bought it.

Reviews.Title: TV review
Reviews.Author: Joseph Rosenthal
Reviews.Content: Terrible picture, terrible sound, very low quality.  I would have paid more for something that really worked well.  Hard to believe something electronic could be so bad in this day.

Reviews.Title: damaged the remote control
Reviews.Author: jose luis raffalli
Reviews.Content: the team has good picture and sound hurts that arrived damaged remote not working, not responding commands  remote control arrived damaged, is not working  unresponsive commands,

Reviews.Title: OKAY
Reviews.Author: Masterjazzy
Reviews.Content: UMMM WELL I BOUGHT IT CAUSE I THOUGHT IT WAS BIG BUT GUESS IT WAS SMALL AND CHEAP AND NOT

Reviews.Title: POORLY MADE RCA TELEVISIONS
Reviews.Author: David "obxdj"
Reviews.Content: Had 2 RCA tv's. Both Broke within a month of each other. They were only 3 years old. RCA said sorry but there is nothing we can do. We don't use that manufacturer any more. RCA does not stand by their products. RCA used to be a high quality brand name. Now RCA MAKES JUNK. AVOID ALL RCA PRODUCTS!!!!!

ProductInfo.Features:
32 - Inch LED HDTV, 3 HDMI Connections, Resolution: 1366 x 768, Tuner Mode: ATSC/NTSC, Contrast: 3500:1
There is no VGA connecter
ProductInfo.Name: RCA LED32B30RQ 32-Inch LED 720p 60Hz HDTV (Black)
